revised_title: John Keith Roberts: A Pioneering Physicist and Scientist
tldr: John Keith Roberts was an Australian physicist who made significant contributions to the fields of heat and thermodynamics, particularly in the areas of heat transfer and adsorption of gases. Despite facing health challenges, he authored a widely recognized textbook on heat and thermodynamics and conducted groundbreaking research on the accommodation coefficient and adsorption of gases on metal surfaces. His work has had a lasting impact on our understanding of adsorption processes and heterogeneous catalysis.
